chunk:
COSRX Vitamin C Serum C-23

Brand: COSRX

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Propolis Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Aronia Melanocarpa Fruit Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Lactate, Water, Cassia Obtusifolia Seed Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin
Directions: After opening, replace cap with provided dropper. Apply two to three drops onto clean skin, avoiding eyes

Warnings: Use SPF protection during the day. Do not use together with other acids like AHAs, BHAs, and retinol. Mild irritation or redness may occur for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts. Contents may turn brown due to oxidation. To avoid this, store in a cool, dark space between 15 C ~ 25 C, as far away from light

for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts. Contents may turn brown due to oxidation. To avoid this, store in a cool, dark space between 15 C ~ 25 C, as far away from light and heat as possible.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
